summary: Modified contact.html page to match the screenshot design. Updated the form structure to include: Full Name section with First and Last fields side by side, Email and Phone fields side by side, Company field, Country dropdown with 'Select Country' placeholder, radio button section for service type (Keynotes, Masterclass, Mentoring, Podcast), and message textarea. Added CSS styling with light beige background (#f5f5dc), two-column layout for certain fields, red '(Required)' text indicators, styled inputs with white backgrounds and rounded corners, and proper radio button styling. The form now matches the screenshot design.
current_status: Contact page updated to match screenshot design. Form includes all required fields with proper layout, styling, and required field indicators. The form maintains the formspree action for submission functionality.
